Public Member Functions
hal::I2CAttr Class Reference

Inherits hal::PinAssignmentPeriphAttr< attr_t, pin_assignment_t >.

Documentation

The I2C attribute class is used for configuring and storing I2C port settings.

See also
hal::I2CPinAssignment
hal::I2C
